name: mousily
content:
mousily adverb
(NERVOUSLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a shy, nervous, or quiet way: She closed the door very mousily and crept downstairs. He peeped mousily out of the window to see what was happening Synonym
nervously
More examplesFewer examplesThe production turned out to be mousily untheatrical.Mousily, Sara moved to the chair and sat down next to him."I'm not sure," he whispered mousily.She left the room and her daughter mousily followed behind.
